skills.name: Basic Workflow
skills.pattern:
name: CI
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm test

skills.name: Workflow Triggers
skills.pattern:
on:
  push:
  pull_request:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * *'
  workflow_dispatch:
  release:
    types: [published]

skills.name: Job Definition
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
  deploy:
    needs: test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

skills.name: Matrix Strategy
skills.pattern:
strategy:
  matrix:
    node-version: [18, 20, 22]
    os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]
runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
steps:
  - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
    with:
      node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}

skills.name: Dependency Cache
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/cache@v4
  with:
    path: ~/.npm
    key: ${{ runner.os }}-node-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
    restore-keys: |
      ${{ runner.os }}-node-

skills.name: Upload Artifact
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: build-output
    path: dist/
    retention-days: 5

skills.name: Download Artifact
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: build-output
    path: dist/

skills.name: Secrets
Environment Variables
skills.pattern:
env:
  NODE_ENV: production
jobs:
  build:
    env:
      CI: true
    steps:
      - run: echo $NODE_ENV

skills.name: Conditional Steps
skills.pattern:
- run: npm run deploy
  if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
- run: echo "PR from ${{ github.head_ref }}"
  if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'

skills.name: Docker Build
skills.pattern:
- uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3
- uses: docker/login-action@v3
  with:
    registry: ghcr.io
    username: ${{ github.actor }}
    password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
- uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
  with:
    push: true
    tags: ghcr.io/${{ github.repository }}:latest

skills.name: Deploy to Pages
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/configure-pages@v4
- uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
  with:
    path: ./dist
- uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4

skills.name: Service Containers
skills.pattern:
services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15
    env:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
    ports:
      - 5432:5432
    options: >-
      --health-cmd pg_isready

skills.name: Job Outputs
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    outputs:
      version: ${{ steps.version.outputs.value }}
    steps:
      - id: version
        run: echo "value=1.0.0" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
  deploy:
    needs: build
    steps:
      - run: echo ${{ needs.build.outputs.version }}

skills.name: Reusable Workflow
skills.pattern:
# .github/workflows/reusable.yml
on:
  workflow_call:
    inputs:
      environment:
        required: true
        type: string
# caller.yml
jobs:
  call:
    uses: ./.github/workflows/reusable.yml
    with:
      environment: production

skills.name: Composite Action
skills.pattern:
# action.yml
name: My Action
runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - run: echo "Hello"
      shell: bash

skills.name: Concurrency Control
Timeouts
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - run: long-running-task
        timeout-minutes: 10

skills.name: Permissions
skills.pattern:
permissions:
  contents: read
  packages: write
  pull-requests: write

skills.name: Environments
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  deploy:
    environment:
      name: production
      url: https://myapp.com
    steps:
      - run: deploy.sh

skills.name: Path Filters
skills.pattern:
on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'src/**'
      - '!src/**/*.test.js'
    paths-ignore:
      - 'docs/**'

skills.name: Create Release
skills.pattern:
- uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
  with:
    files: |
      dist/*.zip
      dist/*.tar.gz
    generate_release_notes: true

skills.name: Node.js Setup
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/setup-node@v4
  with:
    node-version: 20
    cache: 'npm'
    registry-url: 'https://npm.pkg.github.com'

skills.name: Python Setup
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/setup-python@v5
  with:
    python-version: '3.12'
    cache: 'pip'
- run: pip install -r requirements.txt

skills.name: PR Comment
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/github-script@v7
  with:
    script: |
      github.rest.issues.createComment({
        owner: context.repo.owner,
        repo: context.repo.repo,
        issue_number: context.issue.number,
        body: 'Build succeeded!'
      })

skills.name: Status Check
skills.pattern:
- name: Check status
  run: |
    if [ "${{ job.status }}" == "success" ]; then
      echo "Build passed"
    fi

skills.name: Continue on Error
skills.pattern:
- run: npm run lint
  continue-on-error: true
- run: npm test
  id: test
- run: echo "Test result: ${{ steps.test.outcome }}"

skills.name: Working Directory
skills.pattern:
- run: npm test
  working-directory: ./packages/core
defaults:
  run:
    working-directory: ./app

skills.name: Shell Selection
skills.pattern:
- run: echo "Bash"
  shell: bash
- run: Write-Host "PowerShell"
  shell: pwsh
- run: echo "Python"
  shell: python

skills.name: Self-hosted Runner
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, linux, x64]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
